div.data-code:
<html> <body> <marquee font style="bold" scrolldelay="100"><font size="5" face="Verdana"><font color="#6a0a25"> EPCHS will be Remote Learning through April 30th. Students should check their emails and Google Classroom for assignments. Lunches will be provided in eight locations. Please visit our COVID-19 Information page for more information.
</marquee>

div.small: Inside the Tribe is our weekly school broadcast about things happening in and around our school created by Mrs. Jill Dawson's Journalism students!

div.p: You can pick up the form in Student Services and return with payment to Mr. Scott Moore in the Athletic/Attendance office.
